about_the_game:
Season 7 is live!

- New Raider

From Dragon Ball Super: SUPER HERO come Gamma 1 and Gamma 2!

Gamma 1 and Gamma 2 are Raiders of Justice who rescue civilians to accumulate an evolution gauge. Pick up the Powerkey and evolve while sabotaging the survivors. Evolve to level 4 to control Magenta. Once Magenta reaches the entrance to the underground research facility, Cell Max will be activated and can exterminate the survivors with overwhelming destructive power!

- New Gimmick

Once Cell Max is activated, the Super Transphere appears which can transform into Orange Piccolo (Giant)! You can enjoy powerful giant vs. giant battles! With Dragon Balls in the field, Ultimate Dragon Change is of course available through the Shenron wish. If you equip Gohan (Adult)(Beast), you can recreate the battle in the movie!

*Raiders and Survivor Skins added each season need to be unlocked in-game.

____________________

Strategy Defines Survival

1 powerful enemy vs. 7 ordinary citizens! Experience the overwhelming difference in strength that only Dragon Ball can offer!

DRAGON BALL: THE BREAKERS is an online asymmetrical action game where a team of 7 ordinary citizens try to survive the Raider (a classic DRAGON BALL rival such as Cell, Frieza, and Buu), who will hunt and evolve into an unstoppable force!

• SURVIVOR

- Escape from the trapped temporal seam

Cooperate with others and use various means to fight off the Raider and escape from the field!

- Survive using a variety of power-ups and items!

Make full use of the familiar Dragon Ball items and skills, such as Dragon Raider, Solar Flare, and Instant Transmission! Sometimes you can even borrow the power of a Super Warrior to temporarily transform and fight the Raider. Collect 7 Dragon Balls and call up Shenron to power up! You may be able to defeat the Raider...?

Find your own combination from a wide variety of items and skills!

• RAIDER

- Don't let the Survivors get away!

Prevent 7 Survivors from escaping the field by using overwhelming powers unique to Dragon Ball! Aim for total victory by annihilating all Survivors!

- Evolution makes them even more vicious!

Raiders keep evolving and becoming more and more powerful! Aggressively attack Civilians and Survivors to absorb energy. As they evolve, their Super Attacks and skills also become more powerful! The final form can unleash super-powerful Super Attacks!

• CUSTOMIZATION

- Each Survivor and Raider has their own customization elements such as skills and skins!

Enjoy your own customization!

*Internet connection required.

*This product is a multiplayer game that is played mainly through online matches between players. The only modes that allow single play are Episodes, which will be the tutorial, and the Practice Mode, which allows players to practice the game.

*Online matches allow you to play against players from all over the world. You will match with people whose network conditions are optimal for the region you play in.

highlighted.name: We'll Survive If We Work Together!
You're a Lot Braver Than Me
I Guess I'm Too Strong for You
Hey, You're Pretty Good at This!

detailed_description:
Special Edition


The Special Edition includes the full game, Costume items, Victory Pose, and Vehicle Skin.


About the Game

Season 7 is live!

- New Raider

From Dragon Ball Super: SUPER HERO come Gamma 1 and Gamma 2!

name: DRAGON BALL: THE BREAKERS

subs.option_text: DRAGON BALL: THE BREAKERS Special Edition - $29.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 or AMD Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 770 or Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "Low". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 or Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "High". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required. - Windows 10 (Version 1809 or later) and a 4GB VRAM GPU (graphics board or video card) are required for DirectX 12 API.
